properties.name: vempain.license
properties.description: Licence under which Vempain software is distributed.

properties.name: vempain.admin.file.converted-directory
properties.description: Main directory where Vempain stores the files of various types on admin side.

properties.name: vempain.admin.file.thumbnail-size
properties.description: Size in pixels of the thumbnails that are generated from files on admin side.

properties.name: vempain.admin.file.image-format
properties.description: Format used to store images on admin side, see Thumbnailator for supported formats.

properties.name: vempain.admin.ssh.user
properties.description: Vempain Admin site SSH user name.

properties.name: vempain.admin.ssh.private-key
properties.description: Path to ssh private key file on admin-side.

properties.name: vempain.site.www-root
properties.description: Path to website on the remote site-server.

properties.name: vempain.cmd-line.exiftool
properties.description: Path to the exiftool command line utility, used for reading and writing metadata in files.
